role.argrole: with what? (marked by عن / على / ب)

example.parse: (S (VP (PUNC ") (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P لسنا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC راضين) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC تماماً)) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نتائج) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المحادثات))))) (PUNC .)
